issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fix temp table path generation for acid table export

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The actual issues is fixed by HIVE-19861.
This is a follow up to add a test case.

fields.summary: Export of full CRUD transactional table fails if table is not in default database

comments.body: [~jdere] could you review please?  this only adds a test - don't think we even to take up a build queue spot
Does the "create database foo" have to happen before "drop table if exists " + tblName?
since drop has a "if exists" it doesn't matter - at least when I run both tests I don't see any issues

committed to branch-3, master

thanks Jason for the review
